sense.def:
Z izrazom
largely
povemo, da je neka trditev v veliki meri, vendar ne v celoti resnična.

seg.quote: The evidence shows them to be largely correct.
Her work is largely confined to the cinema.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
largely
tudi napovemo najpomembnejši razlog za neki dogodek ali okoliščine.

seg.quote: We were there largely because of the girls.
He was acquitted, largely on the evidence of a tape recording.
